## Overview

Join us at the AAG 2025 Annual Meeting for a symposium on *Geospatial Approaches to Pressing Grand Challenges: Global Pandemic, Climate Change, and Food Security*. We will explore geospatial methods to address urban environmental dynamics and human well-being, fostering discussions on sustainability and public health.

## Details

- 📍 **Location**: Huntington Place, Detroit, USA
- 🕒 **Date**: March 27, 2025, 10:10 AM - 11:30 AM
- 🗣️ **Session Type**: Paper - Hybrid/Streamed
- 🔗 [Event Link](https://aag.secure-platform.com/aag2025/solicitations/82/sessiongallery/23924)
